item.title: Rust implementation of Crate Transparency using Google Trillian
item.description: I’ve been hacking on a Rust-based transparent application for Google Trillian. As appears to be my fixation, this personality is for another package manager. This time, Rust’s Crates often found in crates.io which is Rust’s Package Registry. I discussed this project earlier this month Rust Crate Transparency && Rust SDK for Google Trillian and and earlier approach for Python’s packages with pypi-transparency. This time, of course, I’m using Rust. And, by way of a first for me, for the gRPC server implementation (aka “personality”).
